description:
The **table** component is used to render static content in a formatted table layout with a series of basic columns and rows.
For more dynamic data-driven table layouts with advanced interaction features such as filtering and sorting, please refer to the **data grid** component.
name: Table
usage:
A table can be built of div by using the various classes provided by this module. Some headers can be defined, then followed by a number of rows. You can then use your favorite framework to loop through some items and automatically create some rows, *ngFor for Angular or dom-repeat for Polymer for example. As of version 0.1.2, nested table classes are no longer needed unless you are using non-table Elements to visually represent a table. These classes include: table__cell, table__heading, table__row, table__body #### Basic Example ```html
First Name Last Name Age Gender
John Doe 26 years Male
```
